S04n265:1: yadbhūyasā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvayānīyānāṃ pudgalānāmime doṣā bhaviṣyanti-anabhiyuktā anabhiyuktān pūjayiṣyanti,
S04n265:5: adhyavasāne bahulāḥ kulamatsarāḥ śaṭhā dhvāṅkṣā mukharāḥ kuhakāḥ kṣātragurukāḥ |
S04n265:9: te ajñānino jñānanimittamātmānaṃ pratijñāsyanti-kathaṃ māṃ pare vijānīyuḥ ?
S04n265:14: anyonyabhinnadharmasaṃgāyanatayā svacchandā dṛḍhavairā ākīrṇavyāpādā ayuktaparibhāṣāñjanasaṃjñaptyā iha śāsane cariṣyanti āparipṛcchanaśīlāḥ |
S04n265:17: te daridrakule pravrajitāḥ samānā lābhamātrakeneha śāsane tuṣṭimutpādayiṣyanti |
S04n265:21: nāhaṃ rāṣṭrapāla teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāṃ pudgalānāmānulomikāmapi kṣāntiṃ vadāmi kutaḥ punarbuddhajñānam |
S04n265:24: teṣāṃ punā rāṣṭrapāla tathārūpāṇāṃ pudgalānāmaṣṭau bodheḥ paripanthakarān dharmān vadāmi |
S04n265:26: apāyopapattiḥ daridrakulopapattiḥ pratyantajanapadopattiḥ nīcalukopapattirdurvarṇatāndhatvagatikāḥ pāpamitrasamavadhānaṃ bahumānyatā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālakriyāḥ |
S04n265:27: imān rāṣṭrapāla aṣṭau dharmān bodheḥ paripanthakarān vadāmi |
S04n265:44: nāhaṃ rāṣṭrapāla ṣaṭaśāstṝṃstathā vigarhāmi yathā tān mohapuruṣān vigarhāmi |
S04n265:48: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04n265:49: asaṃyatā uddhata unnatāśca agauravā mānina lābhautsadā |
S04n265:50: kleśābhibhūtāḥ sakhilāḥ sakiṃcanāḥ sudūra te tādṛśa agrabodhaye || 217 ||
S04n265:51: lābhābhibhūtasya kusīda vardhate kusīdabhūtasya pranaṣṭa śraddhā |
S04n265:52: śraddhāvipannasya pranaṣṭa śīla duḥśīlabhūtasya pranaṣṭa saṃgatiḥ || 218 ||
S04n265:53: daridrabhūtāśca hi pravrajitvā dāridyramuktāṃ samavāpya pūjām |
S04n265:54: taiḥ kāñcano bhāramivāpaviddhaḥ sa sasyabhāraḥ punarudgṛhītaḥ || 219 ||
S04n265:55: lābhārthikoaraṇyamupaiti vastuṃ gaveṣate tatra gataśca jñātīn |
S04n265:56: abhijñavidyāpratibhānasaṃpado vihāya gṛhṇāti sa cāpi jñātīn || 220 ||
S04n265:60: ghoraṃ prayāsyanti mahāprapātaṃ yato na mokṣo'styapi kalpakoṭibhiḥ || 222 ||
S04n265:61: yadīha lābhina bhaveta bodhistaddevadatto'pi labheta bodhim |
S04n265:62: vairambhavātena yathaiva pakṣī kṣipyanti lābhena tathā ayuktāḥ || 223 ||
S04n265:65: bodhyarthiko'nveṣati buddhadharmān na tiṣṭhate cāpi yathā samokṣaḥ |
S04n265:66: dṛḍhāḥ sa lepena kṛtaḥ kapirvā mānābhibhūtasya tathaiva bodhiḥ ||225 ||
S04n265:67: bodhyarthikenāpi mayā svajīvaṃ tyaktaṃ priyaṃ dharmapadasya hetoḥ |
S04n265:68: tyaktvā ca dharmāṃsta ayuktayogāḥ nirarthabhūtā nipatanti śāsanam || 226 ||
S04n265:69: mahāprapātaṃ jvalitaṃ hutāśanaṃ subhāṣitārthe patito'smi pūrve |
S04n265:70: śrutvā ca tasmin pratipattiye sthito vihāya sarvāṇi priyāpriyāṇi || 227 ||
S04n265:71: śrutvā guṇāḍhyaṃ ca vicitraśāsanaṃ teṣāṃ spṛhā naikapade'pi jāyate |
S04n265:72: adharmakāmasya kuto'sti bodhiḥ yathaiva cāndhasya pathi prakāśanam || 228 || iti ||
S04n265:74: tena kālena tena samayena siddhārthabuddhirnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n265:76: arciṣmataḥ punā rāṣṭrapāla rājño jambūdvīpe rājyamabhūtṣoḍaśayojanasahasrāṇi |
S04n265:77: tena ca rāṣṭrapāla kālena tasmin jambūdvīpe viṃśatinagarasahasrāṇyabhūvan sarvāṇi kulakoṭisahasrikāṇi |
S04n265:78: tasya khalu punā rāṣṭrapāla rājño'rciṣmato ratnaprabhāsaṃ nāma nagaramabhūdrājadhānī yatra sa rājā arciṣmān prativasati dvādaśayojanānyāyāmena pūrveṇa paścimena ca,
S04n265:82: rājñaḥ punā rāṣṭrapāla arciṣmataḥ puṇyaraśmirnāma putro'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ |
S04n265:84: saptānāṃ ratnānāmekaṃ cātra nidhānaṃ rājñaḥ prāsāde prādurbhūtaṃ daśapauruṣapramāṇaṃ saptānāṃ ratnānām |
S04n265:85: tasya khalu punā rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśme rājakumārasya jātāmātrasyaiva sarve jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvā āttamanaso'bhūvan |
S04n265:87: tena khalu punā rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśminā rājakumāreṇa saptabhirdivasaiḥ sarvaśilpānyadhigatāni yāvanti laukikāni ||
S04n265:88: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśme rājakumārasya śuddhāvāsakāyikā devatā ardharātrakālasamaye saṃcodayanti sma-apramattena te kumāra sadā bhavitavyam |
S04n265:92: paralokabhayadarśinā ca te bhavitavyaṃ na sarmakriyoddhureṇa |
S04n265:94: mā kumāra bhava supramattako mā pramādavaśamabhyupeṣyase |
S04n265:95: apramāda sugatena varṇito ninditā hi sugataiḥ pramattakāḥ || 229 ||
S04n265:96: apramatta iha ye ca sūratā dānasaṃyamaratā amatsarāḥ |
S04n265:98: ye'prameya sugatā atītāḥ sāṃprataṃ ca hi ye'pyanāgatāḥ |
S04n265:99: sarvaeva kuśalaista udgatā apramādapatha eva susthitāḥ || 231 ||
S04n265:101: dattaṃ tairapi ca kalpakoṭiyaḥ prārthayadbhiriha bodhimuttamām || 232 ||
S04n265:104: rajyasaukhyavibhavāṃśca sarvaśo viprahāya dayitāḥ sriyo'pi ca |
S04n265:105: raṅgamāyasadṛśaṃ hi saṃskṛtaṃ saṃśrayasva vanameva niḥspṛhaḥ || 234 ||
S04n265:106: jīvitaṃ capalamadhruvaṃ sadā mṛttikāghaṭaka eva bhedi ca |
S04n265:108: neha mātra na pitā na bāndhavā dhārayanti yatamāna durgatim |
S04n265:111: kasyacinna ca kṛtaṃ tvayā hitaṃ vyartha eva ca niveśitaḥ śramaḥ || 237 ||
S04n265:112: adya te jagata eṣato hitaṃ bodhiśāntamatulaṃ padottamam |
S04n265:113: majjamāṃsamapi carma śuṣyate yadyapi tvamapi mā kṛthā śramam || 238 ||
S04n265:114: durlabho hi sugatasya saṃbhavaḥ śāntadharmaśravaṇaṃ sudurlabham |
S04n265:117: satpathe upanayanti te sadā duṣpathā ca satataṃ nivārakāḥ || 240 ||
S04n265:118: sādhu vīryamapi kṛtva susthiraṃ kāyajīvitaspṛhāṃ vihāya ca |
S04n265:120: durlabhaṃ padavaraṃ hyanuttaraṃ sarva eva purimā narottamā |
S04n265:121: araṇyagocararatāḥ prabhaṃkarāḥ teṣa tvaṃ cara pathe'nuvartakaḥ || 242 ||
S04n265:124: eṣatādya vipulaṃ sugatajñānasaṃcayam eṣatā padavaraṃ hyanuttaram || 243 ||
S04n265:125: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastata upādāya daśabhirvarṣairna jātu styānamiddhamavakrāmitavān,
S04n265:128: na paricārito na jātūdyānabhūmiṃ gato na jātu sakhāyān dṛṣṭvā vismitaḥ |
S04n265:132: ekaḥ pradhyāyamānaḥ sthito'bhūt pratisaṃlīnaḥ paramadaurbalyabhāvaṃ vicintayan |
S04n265:134: apriyasamavadhānaṃ priyavinābhāvaṃ bālollāpanaṃ saṃsāraratinirāsvādaṃ rājyasukhaṃ vimoghadharmaṃ bhavābhīṣṭaṃ śamatṛptaṃ pṛthagjanatvaṃ sadā viruddham |
S04n265:136: sa ekānte tūṣṇībhūtaḥ apramādaṃ vicintayan priyavinābhāvamekākī viharati sma ||
S04n265:137: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla rājñārciṣmatā anyatarasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ratipradhānaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpitamabhūt kumārasya paribhogārtham |
S04n265:142: sarvatra ca ratnasūtre caturdaśa tālapaṅktikoṭyo nibaddhānyabhūvan,
S04n265:143: yāsāṃ vāteneritānāṃ vātasaṃghaṭṭitānāṃ tadyathāpi nāma tūryaśatasahasrasya ghoṣaśabdaḥ syāt |
S04n265:144: sarveṣu ca vīthīmukheṣu pañca pañca kanyāśatāni sthāpitānyabhūvan gītakuśalāni nṛttakuśalāni prathamayauvanaprāptāni sarvajagatparibhogyāni |
S04n265:145: tāsāṃ ca rājñārciṣmatā ājñā dattābhūt-rātridivaṃ bhavantībhirnānyā kthā kāryāṃ anyatra nṛttagītavāditena |
S04n265:149: teṣu ca punaḥ sarvavīthīmukheṣu annamannārthikebhyo dīyate,
S04n265:151: yānaṃ yānārthikebhyo yāvadvadvastragandhamālyavilepanaśayyopāśrayajīvitapariṣkāraṃ suvarṇarūpyamaṇimuktāvaiḍūrya śaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajata hastyaśvaśodhanaṃ sarvābharaṇaṃ ratnarāśayaśca sthāpitā abhūvan sarvajanaparibhogārtham |
S04n265:152: tena ca samayena madhye nagarasya samantato yojanaṃ gṛhaṃ kumārasya māpitamabhūtparibhogāya saptānāṃ ratnānāmaṣṭāpadanibaddhaṃ toraṇasaptapratimaṇḍitam |
S04n265:156: tasya khalu punā rāṣṭrapāla udyānasya madhye puṣkariṇi kāritābhūt saptaratnamayī catūratnasopānī,
S04n265:158: aṣṭottaraṃ ca siṃhamukhaśataṃ yena gandhodakaṃ praviśati tasyāḥ khalu punaḥ puṣkariṇyāḥ |
S04n265:159: aṣṭaśatameva siṃhamukhānāṃ yena punareva tadvāri nirvahati |
S04n265:160: utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkaiḥ satatasamitaṃ saṃpuṣpitā samantataśca ratnavṛkṣaparivāritā sarvakālikaiśca puṣpaphalavṛkṣaiḥ parisphuṭā |
S04n265:161: tasyāḥ puṣkariṇyāḥ tīre aṣṭaśataṃ ratnavṛkṣāṇāṃ māpitamabhūt |
S04n265:164: tāsāṃ ca vāteneritānāṃ vātasaṃghaṭṭitānāṃ śabdo niścarati tadyathāpi nāma tūryaśatasahasrasya saṃpravāditasya |
S04n265:166: mā kumārasya rajo pāṃśurvā śarīre nipatiṣyatīti ||
S04n265:167: tena ca samayena tasmin prāsāde catasra āsanakoṭyaḥ prajñaptā abhūvan saptaratnamayyaḥ |
S04n265:169: tatra ca madhye āsanaṃ prajñaptaṃ saptaratnamayaṃ saptapauruṣamuccatvena aśītidūṣyakoṭibhiḥ prajñaptam,
S04n265:172: triṣkṛtvo divasasya triṣkṛtvo rātreḥ puṣpasaṃstaraḥ kriyate |
S04n265:177: tasmin punā rāṣṭrapāla udyāne śukasārikakroñcakokilamayūrahaṃsacakravākakunālakalaviṅkajīvaṃjīvakā manuṣyapralāpinaḥ pakṣiṇo'bhūvan |
S04n265:178: yeṣāṃ nikūjitāni nadatāṃ nandane devānāmiva madanīyaḥ śabdo niścarati |
S04n265:179: kumārasya ca paribhogārthaṃ pañcarasaśataprakārāṇi bhojanāni satatasamitamabhisaṃskṛtānyabhūvan sarvākārasaṃpannāni ||
S04n265:180: tena ca punaḥ samayena viṃśavarṣāḥ samānāḥ ṣoḍaśavarṣātikrāntāḥ kumārakāḥ sarvanagarebhyaḥ samudānīya tatra ca nagare praveśitā abhūvan sarvaśilpasthānakarmasthānavidhijñāḥ |
S04n265:186: tāśca sarvā abhurūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyāḥ sarvāḥ ṣoḍaśavarṣapramāṇā jātyā gītakuśalā vādyakuśalā nṛttakuśalā hasitakuśalāḥ puruṣopasaṃkramaṇakuśalā ārjavāḥ śiśavā madhurā vṛddhayaḥ pūrvābhilāpinyaḥ smitamukhāśopacārakuśalāḥ sarvakalāsu vidhijñā nātidīrghā nātihrasvā nātisthūlā nātigauryo nātiśyāmāḥ |
S04n265:191: tāsāṃ madhyagataḥ puṇyaraśmī rājakumāraḥ saṃgītisaṃprabhāṇitena tatra ca saṃgītiśabde caivaṃ cittamutpādayati-mahānamitrasaṃgho batāyaṃ mama prādurbhutaḥ kuśaladharmaparimoṣakaḥ |
S04n265:193: sa tasmin samaye syādyathāpi nāma vadhyaḥ puruṣo dṛṣṭvā na vismayacitta mutpādayati,
S04n265:194: evameva puṇyaraśmī rājakumāraḥ tāṃ pramadāṃ dṛṣṭvā na viṣmayati,
S04n265:198: na śabdanimittaṃ na gandha nimittaṃ na rasanimittaṃ na sparśanimittamudgṛhītavān |
S04n265:199: anyatraivaṃrūpaṃ cittaṃ pravartayate sma-kadā tāvadevaṃrūpādamitrasaṃghamadhyānmama mokṣo bhaviṣyati ?
S04n265:200: kadāhamapramādacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yena me mokṣo bhaviṣyati ?
S04n265:201: atha khalu tāḥ kanyakāḥ rājño'rciṣmata ārocayanti sma-na deva kumāraḥ krīḍati,
S04n265:204: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla rājā arciṣmānaśītibhī rājasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ yena puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n265:205: upasaṃkramyāśrumukhaḥ pravepamānena kāyena śocamāno dharaṇitale prapatitaḥ |
S04n265:226: kālo rate rama ihādya suta prasīda || 248 ||
S04n265:230: saṃcintya tāṃ ka iha nābhirameta putra || 249 ||
S04n265:234: śrutvā naraḥ ka iha nātra ratiṃ labheta || 250 ||
S04n265:244: vikṣiptacitta iha kiṃ na ratiṃ karoṣi || 252 ||
S04n265:247: mātā pitā ca tava saṃsthita sāśrukaṇṭhāḥ
S04n265:248: kiṃ duḥkha nāsti karuṇā ca jane tavāsmin || 253 ||
S04n265:253: devāpriyaṃ mam kṛtaṃ na hi kenacinme
S04n265:254: kiṃ tvasti me'dya na hi kāmaguṇeṣu chandaḥ |
S04n265:265: gītaṃ na śroṣyamapi vādyarutaṃ na grāhyaṃ
S04n265:273: cittaṃ samudra iva tarpayituṃ na śakyaṃ
S04n265:277: na tvaṃ pitā na sahajā mama nāpi bhāryāḥ
S04n265:322: vācā na śakyamiha pārthiva bodhi prāptum |
S04n265:324: na tveva me mana ihābhirameta kāmaiḥ || 272 ||
S04n265:333: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumāraḥ prāsādatalagata eva tābhiḥ pramadābhiḥ sārdhaṃ caṃkramannudvignamanāḥ saṃstribhirīryāpathairviharati |
S04n265:337: so'rdharātrakālasamaye aśroṣīt-antarīkṣācchuddhāvāsakāyikā devatā buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣamāṇā gacchanti,
S04n265:338: vistareṇa dharmasya saṃghasya varṇaṃ bhāṣamāṇā gacchanti |
S04n265:339: śrutvā ca rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumāraḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ aśru nipātayati |
S04n265:340: sa saṃvegajāto'ñjaliṃ kṛtvā tāṃ devatāṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04n265:345: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla tā devatāḥ puṇyaraśmirājakumāraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta -
S04n265:351: ahamapi jina dṛkṣye kīdṛśaṃ tasya rūpaṃ
S04n265:352: vadata api ca sarve kīdṛśo cāsya varṇaḥ |
S04n265:355: atha khalu tā devatāḥ puṇyaraśmiṃ rājakumāraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta -
S04n265:358: gagana iva ca śūnyo bhāsate cāsya ūrṇā
S04n265:389: nābhi nikhila durgā guhyakośo hayo vā |
S04n265:400: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumāraḥ buddhasya varṇaṃ śrutvā,
S04n265:403: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṣparaśme rājakumārasyaitadabhavat-yādṛśaḥ saṃbudho bhagavān,
S04n265:424: bhave sati yathā duḥkhasamucchedyā ca jātiḥ,
S04n265:431: nedaṃ śakyaṃ kāmadāsena kleśasaṃmohitena cittakhilena pramādābhiratena bālamadhyagatenāyoniśaścittena
S04n265:432: saṃsāraraktacittena durjanamadhyagatena na śakyaṃ sugatipanthānamapi viśodhayituṃ kutaḥ punaranuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum |
S04n265:434: mā me dvāreṇa niṣkramato jñātisaṃgho'ntarāyaṃ kuryāt ||
S04n265:435: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumāro yena bhagavān siddhārthabuddhisthathāgatastanmukhastataḥ prāsādādātmānamutsṛṣṭavān,
S04n265:436: evaṃ ca bhāṣate sma-sacetsa tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ jānāti sarvaṃ paśyati,
S04n265:438: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla siddhārthabuddhistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dakṣiṇapāṇiṃ prasārya prabhāṃ prāmuñcat,
S04n265:440: tasyāśca prabhāyāḥ śatasahasrapatraṃ padmaṃ śakaṭacakrapramāṇamātraṃ prādurbhūtam |
S04n265:444: aht khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastasmin padme sthitvā yena sa bhagavān siddhārdhabuddhistathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S04n265:446: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla tena siddhārthabuddhinā tathāgatena sā prabhā pratisaṃhṛtā |
S04n265:447: sa ca kumārastasya bhagavataḥ pādamūle chinnāpādapa iva prapatitaḥ śatasahasrakṛtvastathāgataṃ vandate sma ||
S04n265:448: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastaṃ bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata-
S04n265:449: mayā cirādadya hi vaidyarājaḥ kṛcchrādavāpto'dya cirātureṇa |
S04n265:450: ācakṣva me nātha kathaṃ sthito'haṃ lābhī bhaveyaṃ sugatasya śāsane || 289 ||
S04n265:451: śruto mayā nāyaka apramādo niśāmya rātrau divi devatābhyaḥ |
S04n265:452: śrutvā ca saṃvigna hi āgato'haṃ kathaṃ narāṇāṃ bhavate pramādaḥ || 290 ||
S04n265:453: pranaṣṭamārgasya bhavādya deśiko jātyandhabhūtasya bhavādya cakṣuḥ |
S04n265:454: mahāprapātādiha māṃ samuddhara śraddhākarā kāruṇikā cikitsakā || 291 ||
S04n265:455: daridrabhūtasya kuruṣva saṃgrahaṃ baddhasya mokṣaṃ kuru me'dya nātha |
S04n265:456: sasaṃśayebhyo vimatiṃ ca chinda caryāṃ ca me vyākuru bodhimārge || 292 ||
S04n265:457: tīrthaṃ ca saṃdarśaya uhyato me dīpaṃ kuruṣvāpi mamāndhakāre |
S04n265:458: vraṇīkṛtaṃ māṃ hi kuruṣva nirvraṇaṃ śalyaṃ ca me uddhara vaidyarāja || 293 ||
S04n265:461: parīttamāyuḥ kṣayadharmi jīvitaṃ bahvantarāyaṃ kuśalaṃ bhavatyapi |
S04n265:463: etaddhi me vyākuru lokanātha syādbodhisattvo hi yathāpramattaḥ |
S04n265:465: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla siddhārthabuddhistathāgataḥ puṇyaraśme rājakumārasyādhyāśayaṃ viditvā vistareṇa bodhicaryāṃ saṃprakāśayati,
S04n265:466: yaṃ śrutvā puṇyaraśminā rājakumāreṇa vimokṣā nāma dhāraṇī praolabdhā,
S04n265:468: sa vaihāyase sthitvā puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya taṃ tathāgatamabhyavakirati sma,
S04n265:470: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmi rājakumārastasmādantarīkṣādavatīrya taṃ bhagavantaṃ siddhārthabuddhiṃ tathāgataṃ gāthābhirabhyaṣṭāvīt -
S04n265:472: vandāmi te asamajñānadharā sadṛśo na te'sti tribhave virajaḥ || 297 ||
S04n265:473: mṛdu cāru snigdha śubha keśa jinā girirājatulya tava coṣṇiriha |
S04n265:474: noṣṇīṣamīkṣitu tavāsti samo vibhrājate bhruvi vare'pi tavorṇa mune || 298 ||
S04n265:476: kṛpayekṣase jagadidaṃ hi yayā vandāmi te vimalanetra jinā || 299 ||
S04n265:479: dharmaṃ vadan vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasnugdhagiram || 300 ||
S04n265:480: daśanā śubhāḥ sudṛḍha vajranibhāḥ triṃśaddaśāpyaviralāḥ sahitāḥ |
S04n265:481: kurvan smitaṃ vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasatyakathā || 301 ||
S04n265:482: rūpeṇa cāpratisamo'si jinā prabhayā ca bhāsayasi kṣetraśatān |
S04n265:483: bramhendrapāla jagato bhagavan jimhībhavanti tava te prabhayā || 302 ||
S04n265:485: īkṣan vrajasyati yugaṃ bhagavan saṃkampayan dharaṇiśailataṭam || 303 ||
S04n265:486: kāyaśca lakṣaṇacito bhagavan ślakṣṇa cchavī kanakavarṇaṃ tava |
S04n265:487: nekṣan jagad vrajati tṛptimidaṃ rūpaṃ tavāpratimarūpadhara || 304 ||
S04n265:490: tvaṃ dānaśīlanirataḥ satataṃ tvaṃ kṣāntivīryanirataḥ sudṛḍham |
S04n265:492: tva vādiśūra kugaṇipramathi tvaṃ siṃhavannadasi parṣadi ca |
S04n265:493: tvaṃ vaidyarāja trimalāntakaro vandāmi te paramaprītikara || 307 ||
S04n265:495: tvaṃ bramhaghoṣa kalaviṅkaravā vandāmi te tribhavapāragatam || 308 ||
S04n265:497: nātmā na sattva na ca jīvagati dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ || 309 ||
S04n265:503: satatāturaṃ ca jagadīkṣya mune parimocayan vicarase kṛpayā || 312 ||
S04n265:505: mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatāḥ teṣāṃ pradarśayasi mārgam || 313 ||
S04n265:506: ye te babhūva purimāśca jinā dharmeśvarā jagati cārthakarāḥ |
S04n265:507: ayameva taiḥ prakathito'ryapatho yaṃ deśayasyapi vibho'pratimaḥ || 314 ||
S04n265:508: snigdhaṃ hyakarṣaya manojña varaṃ bramhādhikaṃ paramaprītikaram |
S04n265:511: śrutvā hi yāṃ niyutasattvaśatā yānatrayeṇa jina yānti śamam || 316 ||
S04n265:512: tava pūjayā sukhamanekavidhaṃ divyaṃ labhanti manujeṣu tathā |
S04n265:513: āḍhyo mahādhana mahāvibhavo bhavate jagaddhitakaro nṛpatiḥ || 317 ||
S04n265:514: valacakravartyapi ca dvīpapatiḥ jagadāvṛṇoti daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ |
S04n265:515: ratnāni sapta labhate suśubhāṃ tvayi saṃprasādajanako'pratima || 318 ||
S04n265:516: bramhāpi śakra api lokapatiḥ bhavate ca saṃtuṣitadevapatiḥ |
S04n265:517: parinirmito'pi ca suyāmapatiḥ tvatpūjayā bhavati cāpi jinaḥ || 319 ||
S04n265:518: evaṃ hyamogha tava pūja kṛtā saṃdarśanaṃ śravaṇamapyasamam |
S04n265:519: bhavate jagadvividhaduḥkhaharaḥ spṛśate paraṃ padavaraṃ hyajaram || 320 ||
S04n265:521: kṣeme śive viraja āryapathe pratiṣṭhāpapyasyapi jagadbhagavan ||321 ||
S04n265:522: puṇyādhikasya tava puṇyanidheḥ satatākṣayā bhavati puṇyakriyā |
S04n265:523: bahukalpakoṭīṣu na yāti kṣayaṃ yāvanna saṃspṛśati bodhicarām || 322 ||
S04n265:524: pariśuddha kṣetra labhate ruciraṃ paranirmitābha sada prītikaram |
S04n265:525: śuddhāśca kāyavacasā manasā sattvā bhavantyapi ca kṣetravare || 323 ||
S04n265:527: svargāpavarga manujeṣu sukhaṃ bhavate ca puṇyanidhi sarvajage || 324 ||
S04n265:528: kīrtiryaśaśca prasṛtaṃ vipulaṃ tava sarvadikṣu bahukṣetraśatān |
S04n265:529: saṃkīrtayanti sugatāḥ satataṃ tava varṇamāla parṣatsu jinā || 325 ||
S04n265:531: śāntendriyā śamaratā bhagavan vandāmi te naravarapravarā || 326 ||
S04n265:532: labdhā abhijña jina pañca mayā gagane sthitastava niśāmya giram |
S04n265:533: bhavitāsmi vīra sugatau pratimaḥ vibhajiṣya dharmamamalaṃ jagataḥ || 327 ||
S04n265:535: puṇyaṃ yadarjitamidaṃ vipulaṃ jagadāpnuyādapi ca buddhapadam || 328 ||
S04n265:536: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla rājā arciṣmāṃstasyā rātryā atyayenāśroṣītkumārasyāntaḥpure ruditaśabdam |
S04n265:537: śrutvā ca śīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpo yena ratipradhānaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n265:540: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla rājā arciṣmān kumārasyārthe chinnapādapa ina dharaṇītale prapatitaḥ |
S04n265:541: sa utthāya dharaṇitalāt sahasraśaśca tannagaraṃ paricarati rudamānaḥ |
S04n265:542: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla yā tasminnagare nagaradevatā sā rājānamarciṣmantametadavocat-gato mahārāja kumāraḥ pūrvasmin digbhāge siddhārthabuddhiṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ||
S04n265:543: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla rājā arciṣmān kumārasyāntaḥpureṇa sārdhaṃ caturaśītibhiḥ prāṇakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrairyena pūrvo digbhāgastenopajagāma |
S04n265:545: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā ekānte'tiṣṭhat |
S04n265:576: śikṣāṃ cāpi ca loka dṛśyate lipijñāne
S04n265:590: śāntāṃ śītagatiṃ ca nirvṛtiṃ vadasi tvam || 339 ||
S04n265:607: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla sa tathāgataḥ siddhārthabuddhiḥ rājño'rciṣmato'dhyāśayaṃ viditvā tathā dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa yathā sarve avaivartikā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ||
S04n265:608: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastaṃ bhagavantaṃ siddhārthabuddhiṃ tathāgatametadavocat-adhivāsayatu bhagavānasmākāṃ nagare śvobhaktena |
S04n265:609: adhivāsayati ca bhagavān puṇyaraśme rājakumārasya tūṣṇībhāvenānukampāmupādāya ||
S04n265:610: atha khalu puṇyaraśmī rājakumārastau mātāpitarau tāśva pramadā āmantrayati sma-anumodayantu bhavantaḥ sarve sahitāḥ sarve samagrāḥ |
S04n265:613: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla puṇyaraśmī rājakumāro yathālaṃkṛtaṃ ratipradhānaṃ nagaraṃ tathāgatāya niryātayati sma anapekṣaḥ |
S04n265:614: pañcarasaśatavyūhena ca bhojanena taṃ tathāgataṃ pratipādayati sma sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena |
S04n265:615: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ saptaratnacitān vihārān kārayāmāsa maṇicaṃkramān prajñaptānupari ca ratnajālavitānavitatān vāmadakṣiṇena puṣpavṛkṣasupariniṣṭhitān |
S04n265:617: ekaikasya ca bhikṣorabhivandya cīvaro dīyate sma ekaikaḥ |
S04n265:623: na vyāpādavitarkaṃ na vihiṃsāvitarkaṃ na rājyatṛṣṇām |
S04n265:627: na ca dvirapi sa tathāgataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ |
S04n265:628: etasminnantare na snāto na sarpitailena vā gātraṃ mrakṣitam,
S04n265:632: yasmiṃśca samaye sa tathāgataḥ parinirvṛtastasmin samaye lohitacandranasya citā kāritā |
S04n265:633: yatra sa tathāgato dhmāpitastasminneva ca pṛthivipradeśe varṣaśatasahasraṃ dhātūnāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtavān |
S04n265:634: sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ sarvapuṣpaiḥ sarvamālyaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ sarvavādyairyāvat sarvapūjāsatkārān kṛtvā pañcāccaturnavatiḥ stūpakoṭyaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitavān |
S04n265:635: te ca stūpāḥ saptaratnamayā ratnajālasaṃchannā muktājālavitānavitatāḥ |
S04n265:636: saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ pañca pañca chatraśatānyekaikasmin stūpe āropitavān |
S04n265:641: anenopāyena varṣakoṭiṃ pūjāṃ kṝtvāḥ tataḥ pravrajitaḥ |
S04n265:646: tena nirāmiṣacittena catako varṣakoṭyo dharmadānaṃ dattam |
S04n265:652: tasya cānuśikṣitvā sarvajanapado'ntaḥpuraṃ sarvapādamūlaṃ sarvasahāyāśca pravrajitāḥ ||
S04n265:653: atha khalu rāṣṭrapāla śūddhāvāsakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāmetadabhavat-puṇyaraśmeranuśikṣamāṇaḥ sarvarājyajanakadaḥ pravrajitaḥ |
S04n265:657: sarvasya puṇyaraśminā bhikṣuṇā buddhasahasrasya caivaṃrūpā pūjā kṛtābhūt ||
S04n265:658: syātkhalu punaste rāṣṭrapāla etarhi kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā-anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenārciṣmān nāma rājābhūt |
S04n265:661: amitāyuḥ sa tathāgatastena kālena tena samayenārciṣmānnāma rājābhūt |
S04n265:662: syātkhalu punaste rāṣṭrapāla-anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṇyaraśmirnāma rājakumāro'bhūt |
S04n265:665: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṇyaraśmirnāma rājakumāro'bhūt |
S04n265:668: tasmāttarhi rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena tasya puṇyaraśmirājakumārasyāniśikṣitavyamadhyāśayapratipattyā priyāpriyaparityāgitayā apramādacaryayā-evaṃ duḥkhābhisaṃskārapratilabdhā me'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti |
S04n265:669: tatte'nabhiyuktā lābhasatkāraślokagurukā jñātyadhyavasitā mānahatā lābhahatāstapasvino vihanyante,
S04n265:671: nirarthakaṃ pravrajitāḥ śramaṇadūṣakā bodhisattvakhaṭukāḥ kāyavākcittavaṅkāḥ naimittikāḥ vitathapratijñāḥ svapratijñātaścyutāḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāranimittamadhyavasitāḥ |
S04n265:672: ahrīkā anapatrapā acāritrā asaddharmaprasṛtā gocaravirahitā buddhagocarāddūrībhūtā buddhajñānavirahitāḥ mokṣacittavirahitāḥ bodhicittavirahitāḥ |
S04n265:673: tasmāttarhi rāṣṭrapāla imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā boddhavyam-pāpamitrānyudyuktāni na sevitavyāni lābhārthikānām ||
S04n265:674: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata-
S04n265:676: hitvā bodhiṃ guṇaśatanicitāṃ lābhārthaṃ te parakulanicatāḥ || 344 ||
S04n265:677: dhvāṅkṣā duṣṭā hrīdhṛtirahitā kṣetrārthaṃ te namucivaśagatāḥ |
S04n265:679: kāyo'raṇye smṛtirapi nagare lābhārthaṃ te caritavikalpe |
S04n265:680: dūre mokṣo nabha iva dharaṇi dūre jāhu bhujagavadetān || 346 ||
S04n265:681: buddho dharmo na ca priyavadatāṃ tadvatsaṃgho guṇaśatabharitaḥ |
S04n265:702: paścā bodhi na teṣu durlabhā iha sthitvā || 352 ||
S04n265:707: yaśca punā rāṣṭrapāla bodhisattvaḥ pañcapāramitāsu caret,
S04n265:708: yaśceha dharmaparyāyapratipatyā saṃpādayet-ahamatra śikṣiṣye'hamatra saṃvare sthāsyāmi |
S04n265:709: eṣa puṇyaskandho'sya puṇyaskandhasya purataḥ śatatamāmapi kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamāmapi śatasahasratamāmapi koṭiśatasahasratamāmapi,
S04n265:710: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi dhṛtipadamapi nopaiti |
S04n265:711: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāsyamāṇe triṃśatāṃ niyutānāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāśca prajāyā anutpadantapūrvāṇyanuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannāni |
S04n265:714: atha khalu āyuṣmān rāṣṭrapālo bhagavantametadavocat-kiṃnāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
S04n265:720: āttamanā āyuṣmān rāṣṭrapālaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan ||
